remarks: Union of the range of the map defined by ~ df-mapd .  (Contributed by NM, 13-Mar-2015.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
mapdrn.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
mapdrn.o $e |- O = ( ( ocH ` K ) ` W ) $.
mapdrn.m $e |- M = ( ( mapd ` K ) ` W ) $.
mapdrn.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
mapdrn.f $e |- F = ( LFnl ` U ) $.
mapdrn.l $e |- L = ( LKer ` U ) $.
mapdunirn.c $e |- C = { g e. F | ( O ` ( O ` ( L ` g ) ) ) = ( L ` g ) } $.
mapdunirn.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
mapdunirnN $p |- ( ph -> U. ran M = C ) $.
$d F g $.
$d K g $.
$d L g $.
$d O g $.
$d U g $.
$d W g $.
